name: Gust Texture Archive
summary: Learn about .G1T files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Gust has developed many popular role-playing game series, including the Atelier series, Surge Concerto series, and Nights of Azure series. These series use game assets saved in various proprietary file formats, including the G1T format.

Most players will never encounter or need to open a game's G1T files. However, modders may want to extract, modify, and replace the textures a G1T file contains, to change in-game characters' and items' appearance.

description: A G1T file is a texture archive used in a video game developed by Gust, a division of Koei Tecmo Games. It contains 2D images used to skin a game's 3D models. Modders have developed utilities that allow them to extract the textures a G1T file contains.

instructions: You can use Gust Tools (Windows) to extract the textures a G1T file contains and repack textures into a G1T file. You can also open G1T files with Noesis (Windows), with the Noesis G1M/G1T/G1A Importer plug-in installed.
